verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>"Depart,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up from <S%H2088>here,<s%> you and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'To your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it.'

"And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and I will <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

<S%H5927>"[Go<s%> up] to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> for I will not go up in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you are an <S%H7186>obstinate<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H3615>destroy<s%> you on the <S%H1870>way.<s%>"

When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>sad<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> they <S%H56>went<s%> into <S%H56>mourning,<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of them <S%H7896>put<s%> on his <S%H5716>ornaments.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'You are an <S%H7186>obstinate<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> should I <S%H5927>go<s%> up in your <S%H7130>midst<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7281>moment,<s%> I would <S%H3615>destroy<s%> you. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, <S%H3381>put<s%> <S%H3381>off<s%> your <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> from you, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> with you.'"
So the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>stripped<s%> themselves of their <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> [onward.]

Now <S%H4872>Moses<s%> used to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> and <S%H5186>pitch<s%> it <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> a <S%H7368>good<s%> <S%H7368>distance<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, that <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> would <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, whenever <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H168>tent,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> would <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H5324>stand,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H5027>gaze<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, whenever <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> would <S%H3381>descend<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H168>tent;<s%> and the Lord would <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> would <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H7812>worship,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Thus the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> used to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to his <S%H7453>friend.<s%> When Moses <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man,<s%> would not <S%H4185>depart<s%> from the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> Thou dost <S%H559>say<s%> to me, <S%H5927>'Bring<s%> up <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people!<s%>' But Thou <S%H859>Thyself<s%> hast not let me <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou wilt <S%H7971>send<s%> with me. Moreover, Thou hast <S%H559>said,<s%> 'I have <S%H3045>known<s%> you by <S%H8034>name,<s%> and you have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> Thee, <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> let me <S%H3045>know<s%> Thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> Thee, <S%H4616>so<s%> that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight.<s%> <S%H7200>Consider<s%> too, that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is Thy <S%H5971>people.<s%>"
And He <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H6440>presence<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> [with you,] and I will <S%H5117>give<s%> you <S%H5117>rest.<s%>"
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to Him, <S%H518>"If<s%> Thy <S%H6440>presence<s%> does not <S%H1980>go<s%> [with us,] do not <S%H5927>lead<s%> us up from <S%H2088>here.<s%>

"For <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H645>then<s%> can it be <S%H3045>known<s%> that I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in Thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> I and Thy <S%H5971>people<s%>? Is it not by Thy <S%H1980>going<s%> with us, so that we, I and Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> may be <S%H6395>distinguished<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the [other] <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>?"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> for you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and I have <S%H3045>known<s%> you by <S%H8034>name.<s%>"
Then Moses <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H4994>pray<s%> Thee, <S%H7200>show<s%> me Thy <S%H9202>glory!<s%>"

And He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H589>Myself<s%> will make <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and will <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and I will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I will be <S%H2603>gracious,<s%> and will <S%H7355>show<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H834>whom<s%> I will <S%H7355>show<s%> <S%H7355>compassion.<s%>"
But He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> My <S%H6440>face,<s%> for <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> can <S%H7200>see<s%> Me and <S%H2421>live!<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> there is a <S%H4725>place<s%> by Me, and you shall <S%H5324>stand<s%> [there] on the <S%H6697>rock;<s%>

and it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about, while My <S%H9202>glory<s%> is <S%H5674>passing<s%> by, that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> you in the <S%H5366>cleft<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> and <S%H9601>cover<s%> you with My <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I have <S%H5674>passed<s%> by.
"Then I will <S%H5493>take<s%> My <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> My <S%H268>back,<s%> but My <S%H6440>face<s%> shall not be <S%H7200>seen.<s%>"
